LanguageData.WoW_Alliance_Weaponry_T1.label: Alliance Basic Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_Alliance_Weaponry_T1.description: Tier 1 weapons for the Alliance Faction. Includes the Stormwind bastard sword.
LanguageData.WoW_Alliance_Weaponry_T2.label: Alliance Good Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_Alliance_Weaponry_T2.description: Tier 2 weapons for the Alliance Faction. Includes the Stormwind halberd, longsword, claymore, and polearm.
LanguageData.WoW_NightElf_Weaponry_T1.label: NightElf Basic Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_NightElf_Weaponry_T1.description: Tier 1 weapons for the NightElf Faction. Includes the Kaldorei tomahawk and moonglaive.
LanguageData.WoW_NightElf_Weaponry_T2.label: NightElf Good Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_NightElf_Weaponry_T2.description: Tier 2 weapons for the NightElf Faction. Includes the Kaldorei mooncleaver and halberd.
LanguageData.WoW_HighElf_Weaponry_T1.label: HighElf Basic Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_HighElf_Weaponry_T1.description: Tier 1 weapons for the HighElf Faction. Includes the Silver Covenant dagger.
LanguageData.WoW_HighElf_Weaponry_T2.label: HighElf Good Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_HighElf_Weaponry_T2.description: Tier 2 weapons for the HighElf Faction. Includes Includes the Silver Covenant warhammer, glaive, and sabre.
LanguageData.WoW_Draenei_Weaponry_T1.label: Draenei Basic Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_Draenei_Weaponry_T1.description: Tier 1 weapons for the Draenei Faction. Includes the Draenic gavel.
LanguageData.WoW_Draenei_Weaponry_T2.label: Draenei Good Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_Draenei_Weaponry_T2.description: Tier 2 weapons for the Draenei Faction. Includes the Draenic mace and hammer.
LanguageData.WoW_Horde_Weaponry_T1.label: Horde Basic Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_Horde_Weaponry_T1.description: Tier 1 weapons for the Horde Faction. Includes the Horde warcleaver and gladius.
LanguageData.WoW_Horde_Weaponry_T2.label: Horde Good Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_Horde_Weaponry_T2.description: Tier 2 weapons for the Horde Faction. Includes the Horde maul and greatspear.
LanguageData.WoW_BloodElf_Weaponry_T1.label: BloodElf Basic Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_BloodElf_Weaponry_T1.description: Tier 1 weapons for the BloodElf Faction. Includes the Sin'dorei warblade and warmace
LanguageData.WoW_BloodElf_Weaponry_T2.label: BloodElf Good Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_BloodElf_Weaponry_T2.description: Tier 2 weapons for the BloodElf Faction. Includes the Sin'dorei ranseur and glaive.
LanguageData.WoW_Forsaken_Weaponry_T1.label: Forsaken Basic Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_Forsaken_Weaponry_T1.description: Tier 1 weapons for the Forsaken Faction. Includes the Forsaken cleaver and dirk.
LanguageData.WoW_Forsaken_Weaponry_T2.label: Forsaken Good Weaponry
LanguageData.WoW_Forsaken_Weaponry_T2.description: Tier 2 weapons for the Forsaken Faction. Includes the Forsaken blade, crescent blade, and halberd.
